docs.snippet: Trump’s vainglorious, vandalistic and vulgar presidency makes some people pine for a royal family. Don’t.
Is smash-mouth liberalism the way to a majority or the satisfaction of self-righteousness?
Until now, Trump’s economic ignorance hasn’t mattered much. But that may be changing.

headline.print_headline: Trade War, What Is It Good For? Absolutely Nothing
headline.main: Trade War, What Is It Good For? Absolutely Nothing

docs.snippet: In Canada, Europe and Asia, leaders said they would respond to Mr. Trump’s steel and aluminum tariffs with restrictions of their own.

headline.print_headline: Trade Partners Respond in Kind To Tariff Plans
headline.main: Trump’s Tariffs Prompt Global Threats of Retaliation

docs.snippet: Under public pressure over high prescription prices, the large insurer announced it would share the discounts with millions of its customers.

headline.print_headline: Big Insurer Will Pass On Discounts To Insured
headline.main: UnitedHealthcare Says It Will Pass On Rebates From Drug Companies to Consumers

docs.snippet: On the itinerary for the Ohio governor and 2016 presidential hopeful: a diner visit, a Q. and A. at a college and criticism of President Trump amid speculation about a 2020 run.

headline.print_headline: Ohio Is Lovely, But a Primary Tempts Kasich
headline.main: John Kasich Is Back in New Hampshire. It’s Not for the Foliage.

docs.snippet: All over the United States, women are leading citizen rebellions.

headline.print_headline: The Teachers Revolt in West Virginia
headline.main: The Teachers Revolt in West Virginia

docs.snippet: A report released by Democrats on the Senate Homeland Security Committee found that agents more often cited needs for technology and personnel to secure the border with Mexico.

headline.print_headline: Border Agents Say They Need Technology, Not a Wall, to Stem Illegal Traffic
headline.main: What Border Agents Say They Want (It’s Not a Wall)

docs.snippet: Every Asian country now trades more with China than with the United States, often by a factor of two to one. Here’s how the outlines of the rivalry are defining the future of the continent.

headline.main: How China Is Challenging American Dominance in Asia

docs.snippet: Putin’s victory on Sunday is a certainty, but what other victories might he win in Europe?
